resources.string:
How to use the app: There are three main features of this app: 1. Health and Fitness 2. Photos 3. Find Pharmacies
1. Health and Fitness Here is where you can find useful info and inspiration about how to maintain fitness, exercises and good habits to stay healthy. It is possible to still have fun and feel young again, despite having health problems. Find out more here. 2. Photos Have any memories you cherish most? You can store them here! Wouldnâ€™t that be lovely? Now you know you know where all your favourite pictures are kept. You can upload photo from your album or take new ones by using a camera function with the aid of this app. 3. Find pharmacies Having trouble remembering important contacts or addresses for health support? You can find them all here!
Settings Having trouble reading in this app? You can adjust the size by choosing the settings.
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
